info: Jesper Jakobson Kyd (born February 3, 1972 in HÃ¸rsholm, Denmark) is a Danish composer and sound designer, who has worked on various video games, television, and film projects. He has composed soundtracks for the Assassin's Creed series, Hitman series, Borderlands series, Darksiders II and State of Decay, among many others. His scores use orchestra, choir, acoustic manipulations and electronic soundscapes.
